text:
[Verse]
Stars up in the sky so bright
Moonlight whispers faint tonight
City lights fade out of sight
We chase dreams till morning light

[Verse 2]
Neon signs flash in our eyes
Lost in the night no goodbyes
Midnight breeze like lullabies
In this moment we just rise

[Chorus]
Oh oh midnight sky
We fly so high high high
Oh oh never die
We light the night night night

[Verse 3]
Footsteps echo on the street
Heartbeats sync in perfect beat
Every touch is so sweet
In the dark where we meet

[Bridge]
We drift on the night wind's song
In this dream we belong
Know the night won’t be long
But in this dream we are strong

[Chorus]
Oh oh midnight sky
We fly so high high high
Oh oh never die
We light the night night night
title: Midnight Sky
